name: Hentai Hexa Mosaic
description:
Henta Hexa Mosaic opens up new possibilities in the world of hentai puzzles - collect images from hexagons, enjoy the result and get achievements. Rest assured, this is not as difficult as it seems, because now you have 6 ways for moving!

Features:
  • Hentai pixel art
  • Six vectors of moving
  • 100 achievements
  • Gallery mode
  • Relaxing music
